Package Controller

Class MainController

java.lang.Object
Controller.MainController
Direct Known Subclasses:
ChooseSongViewController, FriendViewController, KeyboardSettingsController, LogInUserController, ManageAccountController, MenuController, PianoKeysController, RegisterUserController
public class MainController
extends java.lang.Object
This class is in charge of handling the different views for the client side. Some of the views that this class offers is the login view and the register view. Moreover, this class in also used to assign listeners and and get the inputs for login and register.

    • showSaveSongDialog

      protected int showSaveSongDialog()
      this method shows a dialog so the user can create there song and save it
      Returns:
      an integer indecating the option the user selected whether the user selected okay (JOptionPane.OK_OPTION) or cancel (JOptionPane .CANCEL_OPTION)
      See Also:
      JOptionPane
